Class Employee

java.lang.Object
Employee
public class Employee extends Object
Employee class for Restaurant Management System Handles employee data, authentication, and role management

    • authenticateWithPin

      public static Employee authenticateWithPin(String pin)
      Authenticate employee with PIN
      Parameters:
      pin - The PIN to authenticate with
      Returns:
      Employee object if authentication successful, null otherwise

    • getEmployeeById

      public static Employee getEmployeeById(int employeeId)
      Get employee by ID
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The employee ID to search for
      Returns:
      Employee object if found, null otherwise

    • isManager

      public boolean isManager()
      Check if employee has manager privileges
      Returns:
      true if employee is a manager, false otherwise

    • getDisplayName

      public String getDisplayName()
      Get formatted display name with title
      Returns:
      Formatted string with name and title

    • getManager

      public Employee getManager()
      Get manager information if this employee has a manager
      Returns:
      Manager Employee object, or null if this employee is a manager

    • addEmployee

      public static boolean addEmployee(String name, double salary, String pinCode, String title, Integer managerId)
      Add a new employee to the database (Manager only)
      Parameters:
      name - Employee name
      salary - Employee salary
      pinCode - Employee PIN code
      title - Employee title/position
      managerId - Manager ID (null if this employee is a manager)
      Returns:
      true if employee was added successfully, false otherwise

    • updateEmployee

      public static boolean updateEmployee(int employeeId, String name, double salary, String pinCode, String title, Integer managerId)
      Update an existing employee's information (Manager only)
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee to update
      name - New employee name
      salary - New employee salary
      pinCode - New employee PIN code
      title - New employee title/position
      managerId - New manager ID (null if this employee is a manager)
      Returns:
      true if employee was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • getAllEmployees

      public static Employee[] getAllEmployees()
      Get all employees from the database (Manager only)
      Returns:
      Array of all Employee objects, or empty array if none found

    • isPinCodeAvailable

      public static boolean isPinCodeAvailable(String pinCode, Integer excludeEmployeeId)
      Check if a PIN code is already in use by another employee
      Parameters:
      pinCode - The PIN code to check
      excludeEmployeeId - Employee ID to exclude from check (for updates)
      Returns:
      true if PIN is available, false if already in use
